title: Champion update: Poppy, Keeper of the Hammer

replies.body: Am I the only one losing it over how the enemy champs go flying when she uses her ult?! HAHAHAHHAHAHHAHAHAHHHA {{item:3133}} {{summoner:31}} {{summoner:31}}
same here, was like "oh another knock back this is boring" *presses play* hahaha wtf
This is gonna be so troll

Or a well coordinated long-range delivery into a {{champion:157}} ult.
Looks like Team Noxus is blasting off again!
that ult.....

Finally my 4 {{champion:78}} skins that my friends mystery gifted me will go to use now :D
Am i the only one who see's the old poppy face in lollypoppy??? seriously look at the face of the lollipop and then the old lolipoppy skin they are the same!!

This might sound strange, but these videos look like the way ALISTAR should fight. he is a bull, and his knock ups and attacks should have this feeling of power and threat. Currently they don't.
Lollipoppy still lives on. Goooooood.
You can see the old LolliPoppy's face in the closest Lollipop
Poppy looks wonderful, good work rito. Can't wait to play ping pong with an unsuspecting victim, feat. lee sin.{{item:3133}}

Is Poppy going to be enabled on the weekly champion rotation? This new update looks really nice!

she is cheap as chips bro just buy her with ip
{{champion:78}} {{item:3096}}
haha i meant for everyone else brother, i own all champions so it doesn't bother me my friend :p
Pretty sure is 450 ip, anyone can afford that
You could legit just walk into the enemy jungle, find their jungler farming, ult them away, and take the camp.

I think this rework could also make {{champion:78}}  an effective tanky support for some match ups, particularly her new W. Yeah she has a new slow and Heroic Charge, but Steadfast Presence **STOPS DASHES**; aka {{champion:51}} ,{{champion:81}} ,{{champion:104}} ,{{champion:133}} , {{champion:67}} ,{{champion:236}} and maybe even {{champion:429}} hop might be countered. 

That, and the new ult is a big "F You" to ganks from jungle or mid lane.

{{champion:157}} 's ult is a blink. You can use it when you are inside {{champion:45}} E, and when a knocked up champ is outside, and vice versa.

{{champion:245}} 1st part of his E will be stop by it, the 2nd part will not.

{{champion:421}} ult, {{champion:57}} W, {{champion:105}} E are untargetable dashes. This what we need some {{summoner:13}} on.
I don't think{{champion:54}} ult count since azir ult can't stop it
but a mere {{champion:35}} box will stop it :(
Isn't Hec immune to CC while casting ?

i immediately thought of this {{champion:223}} eats his ally to save them in a big team fight {{champion:78}} ults and knocks both back to base nice protecting your carry its now a 3v5 lol{{champion:223}} {{item:3070}} {{item:3070}}
Yeah but if you think about it then Tahm could use his ult to reenter the fray afterwards
I fell in love with the splash art
Anyone else getting a laharl vibe from her default skin?
Holy shit I see that
With the wording of the ultimate what happens if you hit them with it and you are standing in between the enemy and their base? Do they fly back over your head or towards your base?
Apparently they will always go towards their base. Which will be weird to watch lol throwing the hammer forward to have the enemy fly back the direction you threw the hammer from.

I have a question with her ult I hit them towards my base do they all fly into my base?
and if I ult a jg creep, where are they going?
Ultimate only knocks back enemy champions, no knock-back on minions/monsters, and will only knock enemy to their base.

i dont normally login to comment, my first time actually XD BUT I MUST SAY YOU GUYS DID A WONDERFUL JOB ON THE SPLASH ARTS! Damn Im really liking the new splash arts, hopefully more old ones get remade soon :D. So much hype to play new poppy {{champion:78}}

coz not getting anything
Its {{champion:83}} 's turn next pls riot

Been waiting so long for this poppy update, looks sooo good, but why is there such a disparity between splash art face and in game face model? aside from being less cheruby and more narrow and pointy, the overtly exaggerated and cartoony facial animations she constantly pulls makes her face seem sharper and they all tend to be creepy. (new dance creep levels through the roof) the update looks great but shes supposed to be stern/stoic-ish (maybe grumpy even?) which comes across amazingly in her new classic splash but gets gutted in game by those nasty over done facial animations. Maybe its just me? i appreciate the extra effort put into the animations but did they all need to be so exaggerated and clash so hard with her character?
i hate this

When I saw the new ult I thought to myself 
WHAT THE ACTUAL FLYING F***
